entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
